title: Coexposure to microplastic and Bisphenol A exhacerbates damage to human kidney proximal tubular cells
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Daniela Verzola, Noemi Rumeo, Stefano Alberti, Fabrizio Loiacono, Sebastiano La Maestra, Mario Passalacqua, Cristina Artini, Elisa Russo, Enrico Verrina, Andrea Angeletti, Simona Matarese, Nicoletta Mancianti, Paolo Cravedi, Micaela Gentile, Francesca Viazzi, Pasquale Esposito, Edoardo La Porta
